title.rendered: What’s the Fastest Way to Find an Old File?

content.rendered:
The easiest way to search for an old file in Dumpster is to filter by file type: photo, video, document, etc. 

You can do so by tapping on the “Sort” icon located in the upper right hand corner of Dumpster’s main screen and then selecting “Type.” You can then scroll through the results of the relevant “type” only.
